title: Fashion. a History from the 18th to the 20th Century
author: Reiko Koga-Akiko Fukai-, Rie Nii
description: Fashion History is a fascinating excursion through the last three centuries of clothing trends. The KCI believes that 'clothing is an essential manifestation of our very being' and their passion and dedication positively radiate from every page of this book. This special 25th anniversary edition has a chic new format: two volumes packaged in a slipcase.
